tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Y Rajyalakshmi has been boon for us.
During my 1st child, We moved to Bengaluru during mid pregnancy of my wife. She studied all earlier files & took over our case. Thanks to all her effort, my wife delivered my 1st child naturally.
Such was our trust in her that we went back to her after 5 years for our 2nd pregnancy. This time again she rose to occasion & my wife delivered 2nd child also naturally ( a big deal in today's time).
Thank you mam for the 2 flowers I have in my life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Normal Delivery,
review:
Hi

I was consulting Dr. Y Rajyalakshmi mam in cloudnine Whitefield branch for my pregnancy.i am a first time mother. and my whole experience of pregnancy and delivery is so awesome with Rajyalakshmi mam and cloudnine hospital.

She listens so patient fully to all your questions and queries. No matter how long your list is. She carries a big smile in her face everytime i visit.which gave me  a positive vibe always. I remember some consultations i entered with a big tensed head and came out with a big smile on my face. Never waited long to meet her during the consultations.

She explained me everything in detail regarding delivery and all. She is always focused on normal delivery.my baby's head was not in down position upto 38 weeks.she waited till 39 week by saying it will change. And yes it did. Unfortunately the water level was decreased and i got admitted on the last day of my 39 weeks for the delivery. She tried almost 16 hours for normal delivery.but my body didn't respond well to the induction process and some emergency situation occurred like my baby had done poop inside( i was having continuous cough and nose blockage but no medicines were recommended at that time as it might hurt the delivery process) and i got a C-section.

Will share my experience inside the O.T too. As i was in labour pain I remember before giving anaesthesia to me Rajyalakshmi mam gave me confidence there too to keep calm and everything will be alright.i felt like my mother is beside me.and it made me so happy.after that i was so relaxed and yeah finally saw my baby girl.
ALL thanks to Dr. Rajyalakshmi mam for the proper guidance and treatment during my pregnancy. I am fully satisfied. Thank you mam.

Even she observed me post delivery too. Make me learnt some exercises. And in cloudnine hospital i got all the facilities (bill was high though) and the nurses and the other doctors were so helpful and friendly.

I will highly recommend Dr. Y Rajyalakshmi if you want to consult for your pregnancy or any gynic problem.i am sure you will get your solution with all satisfication.

Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This is my second pregnancy and another successful normal delivery under the guidance of Rajyalakshmi mam. I had a wonderful experience in my first delivery and hence, she was undoubtedly the first preference for my second delivery too. She has been very friendly and most importantly easily approachable for any minor/major queries. The warmth in conversations with her is like a family and has literally helped me throughout this journey. In the world of C sections, my desire and determination for normal delivery  was definitely fulfilled with utter care by Rajyalakshmi mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr.Y Rajyalakshmi was wonderful.She was extremely caring, supportive and kind.Doctor received us like a family with her smile,everytime when I met her I feel like my own mother. She was polite and took time to explain us things and gave us moral support during my pregnancy and post pregnancy too. Even though I was conceived by IVF and she knew that it's complicated pregnancy, but she did normal vaginal delivery for me without any difficulties. I was shocked and ofcourse very happy that we are blessed with a healthy baby boy. She always addressed our concerns politely at any time.Her experience and commendable knowledge  makes us feel that we are in safe hands.I would highly recommend Dr. Y Rajyalakshmi for gynec treatments.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I am first time mother. During my pregnancy I was consulting other doctor in reputed hospital. Due to change in my residence during my last days of pregnancy I consulted Dr. Y Rajyalakshmi on 21st(37th +1 week). Doctor clearly explained the complication which my previous doctor also explained. I could not go to my previous hospital as I stayed far away and was convinced to get my delivery done through Dr Y Rajyalakshmi. Doctor tried for normal delivery for nearly 12 hours but my body could not respond as required. So doctor decided for C - Sec which was than the best for baby and me. Even after Post Delivery doctor examined me patiently and explained me how to take care of myself. 
I strongly recommend Dr.Y Rajyalakshmi. 

But I do not recommend Cloudnine whitefield branch as the communication is very poor by the staff there. Till the admission I got nearly 5 different communications regarding the package price. And nursing staff are very rude. One sister literally threw a pillow on my body when I asked her to help me with an extra pillow post delivery. 2nd day I had severe pain and my bladder was full. During this time my mom called sisters for help. But not even a single sister or house keep staff came for help. Billing is hilarious. ****** ** *** **** *** other staff including nurses are not good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr Rajalakshmi for my 2nd pregnancy. Doctor is very friendly and approachable. She was available via mobile for any queries or even for emergency. She guided me well throughout my pregnancy and helped me during the delivery as well. I am very happy with Doctor and shall recommend her for obs/ gyn consulting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr for my second delivery which was filled with gestational diabetes and thyroid issues. Dr helped me in having diabetic under control without insulin. She was so caring throughout the journey. It was an elective csec as my first delivery was a csec.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** *** ***** , she is motherly caring ,responsible, very friendly , she listens patients problem and guide accordingly my wife whole pregnancy was very critical , Dr . Rajyalakmi mam solved all huddles and she did Normal delivery . *** ** **** ** **** * ********** ********* *** .

My wife had met the doctor for gynecological issue. ****** *** ****. We are satisfied with the treatment given. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Medicine was suggested by the doctor. No medical tests were done. There was some waiting time in the hospital, it was for 10-15 minutes. Doctor was friendly with her during the consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have visited for my first  Pregnancy from  4 month onwards .She is empathetic ,optimistic and friendly ,spends enough time to clear our doubts unlike other hurry doctors .Her treatment is unique and recommends only required medicine and scans .She waited patiently till due date and also during labour .I had normal delivery with epidural procedure.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Rajyalakshmi madam for my wife firsrt delivery 7 years ago , we had no problem with her,entire experience was good and we had a baby girl. Now we started consulting her again in Rx Dx as my wife is pregnant , after 7 years also she is same, she is very nice and normal. She will not suggest any unnecessary tests. We had a baby boy this time. She will respond to you incase of urgency or any need . You can meet her with out any doubt for pregnancy treatment. urgency

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly doctor and listens to our problems with patience. We consulted the doctor(for my wife) from past 2years for the Thyroid and other issues. Later we had asked madam, we are planning for the baby, as per the treatment and medication from the doctor with in 1-2months pregnancy was confirmed.  Finally we are blessed with baby girl. We are very much satisfied with her treatment and the way doctor takes care of patients. **** ****** ** **** **** ** ********* ** ***** ******* ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been visiting with Dr.Rajyalakshmi  from almost 3yrs+ she s like more a family doctor..who is having more patience in checking and takecaring of the patients..

After my first delivery with her got some vaginal issue...i hav went to her and had the checkup and suggested good course of medice and it got cured... 

I would suggest/recommand Dr.Rajyalakshmi *** **** ********* ** ************

From past 3yrs am fully satisfied with her service.. Thanks doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a perfect doctor with lot of patience and also supportive and friendly. I will recommend her to all relatives and friends. And she doesn't prescribe unnnessary medication after delivery. As we preferred for normal delivery, she support us with lot of patience in delivering bby normally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: My doctor(Dr.Y Rajyalakshmi) is very good and had an amazing experience. Any time reachable over the phone for any emergency.  The care and concern towards patient it is an awesome experience right from the day one of my pregnancy. Due to emergency had to undergo cesarean,but the situation was well handled by the Dr and all the other faculty involved . Hospital ambience is good.  Overall experience is good.  Thank you to my doctor. I would really recommend my doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr Rajyalakshmi for my period problem and pregnancy.We had a wonderful experience with her overall.She is very calm, composed and amiable person, doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines and tests at all.I went for normal check up for ninth month and Ma'am did an internal check up she told I was already in early labour, she immediately asked me to get admitted and I delivered within two hours.We were blessed with a baby girl.My delivery was normal and it was very smooth as Ma'am is very encouraging during my labour period.My delivery was at night and Ma'am was present even at odd hour she only left only after ensuring that I was fine, She visited me very timely post delivery.I completely recommend her to you all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am a first time mother,and my whole experience of pregnancy and delivery was so awesome. from the day one I was consulting Rajyalakshmi mam.both pre and post . She is a good doctor I ever seen , She care like a mother and listens all queries with calm . which gave me a positive vibe . after 4 years I become a mother with amazing experience . I enjoyed every moment without any tensed . She always explain me everything in details .Because of her only I gave birth  a healty baby Girl .I was so inspired by her behavior , So decided to give my baby Girl name Adilakshmi as like  Rajyalakshmi mam .  All thanks to Dr. Rajyalakshmi mam .  my journey of pregnancy was so smooth and  aswesome . now I can go for Second baby also ..treatment was good and I am fully satisfied. Thank you so much Rajyalakshmi mam Binita & Amaresh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such a nice doctor she is..very patient, friendly,. Spent good quality of time...went to her with so much tension..she listned to me patiently..she camly explained ..gave support.***** *** **** ****** * **** *** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have visited Dr. rajya Lakshmi mam throughout the my 1st and 2nd pregnancy, delivering normal, full term and health babies. I got my baby and baby girl with normal vaginaI delivery. I definitely recommend Dr. Rajya Lakshmi mam to all those couples who want a solid expertise, polite and attentive. Thankyou mam for gifting us a healthy babies with life time happyness.
